get.summary: Get all KÃ¼A plan entries for this event.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: If given, only include entries that end after the given point in time (this includes entries that span over this point in time)

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: If given, only include entries that begin before the given point in time (this includes entries that span over this point in time)

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: If given, only include entries that belong to one of the given categories. Must be a comma-separated list of categories' UUIDs.

parameters.name: rooms
parameters.description: If given, only include entries that take place (at least) in one of the given rooms. Must be a comma-separated list of rooms' UUIDs.

parameters.name: without_room
parameters.description: If true, only include entries that have no room assigned.

parameters.name: after_exclusive
parameters.description: If the `after` filter is active: If true, only entries that end strictly after the point in time are included. Otherwise, entries that end exactly at the `after` point in time are included as well.

parameters.name: before_inclusive
parameters.description: If the `before` filter is active: If true, entries that start exactly at the `before` point in time are included as well. Otherwise, only entries that start strictly before the point in time are included.

parameters.name: match_previous_dates
parameters.description: If true, entries with a previous date that matches the after/before and rooms filters are included,  even if their current begin/end or rooms do not match the after/before filter.

404.description: The requested event does not exist.
